title: report
description: the main object containing all the context pertaining to a computing task

header.description: information about the source of the report and publishing organization's details

licensing.description: the type of licensing applicable for the sharing of the report

formatVersion.description: the version of the specification of this set of schemas defining the report's fields

formatVersionSpecificationUri.description: the URI of the present specification of this set of schemas

reportId.description: the unique identifier of this report, preferably as a uuid4 string

reportDatetime.description: the publishing date of this report in format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

publisher.description: the details about the publishing organization who produced the report

division.description: name of the publishing department within the organization

projectName.description: name of the publishing project within the organization

publicKey.description: the cryptographic public key to check the identity of the publishing organization

datasets.description: the list of datasets processed by the computing task

measures.description: the software and/or hardware measures of the computing task

task.description: the nature of the task being measured

taskType.description: type of the computing task of machine learning, example : preprocessing, supervised, unsupervised, unsupervised, postprocessing, semisupervised,postprocessing ...

taskStage.description: stage of the task if any, example: training, finetuning, reinforcement, inference...

algorithms.description: the main algorithmic approaches used by the computing task

measuredAccuracy.description: the measured accuracy of your model (between 0 and 1)

estimatedAccuracy.description: if you didn't measure the accuracy of your model in concrete percentages, you can give an assessment of the precision between: VERY POOR, POOR, AVERAGE, GOOD, VERY GOOD

system.description: system information of the infrastructure on which is run the computing task

distroVersion.description: distribution's version of the operating system

software.description: programming language information of the computing task

language.description: name of the programming language used, example : C, Java, Julia, Pyhton...

version.description: version of the programming language used

infrastructure.description: the infrastructure on which is performed the computing task

hashAlgorithm.description: the hash function to apply first to the JSON report

cryptographicAlgorithm.description: the public key function to apply to the hash

value.description: encrypted value of the hash value of the minimized JSON instance string, using the publisher's private key and including all root properties except the $hash property itself
